message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $11,500. I believe it will be highly valuable to you.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but $11,500 is a bit too high for me. Would you consider selling it for $10,500?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $11,000. This offer reflects the true value of the product.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price. I could do $10,750.  Let me know if that works for you.
